hero.title: Transforming Lives Through
hero.description: For over 15 years, we've been empowering students with cutting-edge skills and knowledge to excel in the digital world.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: A journey of innovation, dedication, and transforming lives through technology education.
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2010, the Forum Institute of Advanced Computing (FIA) began as a small training center with a big vision: to bridge the gap between academic learning and industry requirements in the rapidly evolving field of information technology.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we have grown from a modest institute to one of the most respected technology education providers in the region. Our commitment to excellence, industry-relevant curriculum, and student-centered approach has helped thousands of students achieve their career goals.
story.paragraph3: Today, FIA stands as a beacon of quality education, continuously adapting to the latest technological trends and ensuring our graduates are well-prepared for the challenges of tomorrow's digital landscape.

timeline.founded: Founded FIA with a vision to transform IT education
timeline.dataScience: Launched Data Science and AI programs
timeline.osaka: Opened branch campus in Osaka, Japan

whyChoose.title: Why Choose FIA?
whyChoose.subtitle: Discover what makes us the preferred choice for technology education and career advancement.

partnerships.title: Industry Partnerships
partnerships.description: Strong connections with leading tech companies ensuring our curriculum stays current and our graduates find excellent job opportunities.

instructors.title: Expert Instructors
instructors.description: Learn from industry professionals with years of real-world experience who bring practical insights to the classroom.

facilities.title: Modern Facilities
facilities.description: State-of-the-art labs, latest software, and cutting-edge equipment to provide hands-on learning experience.

careerServices.title: Career Services
careerServices.description: Comprehensive career support including job placement assistance, interview preparation, and networking opportunities.

certifications.title: Industry Certifications
certifications.description: Earn recognized certifications that validate your skills and enhance your credibility with employers.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Round-the-clock academic and technical support to ensure you never feel alone in your learning journey.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide world-class technology education that empowers individuals with the skills, knowledge, and confidence needed to excel in the digital age and contribute meaningfully to the global technology landscape.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading institution for technology education, recognized globally for innovation, excellence, and the success of our graduates in shaping the future of technology.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Dedicated professionals committed to your success and growth in the technology field.

shashini.name: Shashini Perera
shashini.bio: 15+ years in education and curriculum development, ensuring our programs meet industry standards.

thilini.name: Thilini Silva
thilini.bio: Dedicated to student success with expertise in career counseling and placement services.

diushan.name: Diushan Fernando
diushan.bio: Leading our technical infrastructure and innovation in educational technology solutions.

john.name: John Mitchell
john.bio: Building global partnerships and opportunities for our students and graduates worldwide.

hero.description: Join thousands of successful graduates who have transformed their careers through our comprehensive technology programs. Your future in tech starts here.

confirmation.title: Application Submitted Successfully!
confirmation.message: Thank you for your interest in Forum Institute of Advanced Computing. We have received your application and our admissions team will review it carefully.
confirmation.emailSent: A confirmation email has been sent to
confirmation.emailDetails: with your application details and next steps.

nextSteps.title: What Happens Next?
nextSteps.step1: Our admissions team will review your application within 3-5 business days.
nextSteps.step2: You may be contacted for an interview or to provide additional documentation.
nextSteps.step3: You will receive a decision notification via email within 2 weeks of submission.

needHelp.title: Need Help?
needHelp.description: Our admissions team is here to assist you throughout the application process.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.quote: The program at FIA completely transformed my career. The hands-on approach and industry connections helped me land my dream job at a top tech company.

testimonials.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
testimonials.quote: The practical skills I learned here are exactly what I use every day in my role as a data scientist. The instructors really know their stuff.

testimonials.name: Maria Rodriguez
testimonials.quote: FIA's cybersecurity program gave me the confidence and expertise to transition into this exciting field. The support from faculty was incredible.

testimonialsSection.title: Success Stories
testimonialsSection.subtitle: Hear from our graduates who have transformed their careers through our programs.

requirements.question: What are the admission requirements?
requirements.answer: Basic computer literacy and high school education or equivalent. Some programs may have specific prerequisites.

duration.question: How long does the application process take?
duration.answer: Typically 2-3 weeks from submission to decision. We'll keep you updated throughout the process.

payment.question: What payment options are available?
payment.answer: We offer flexible payment plans, scholarships, and accept various payment methods including installments.

defer.question: Can I defer my enrollment?
defer.answer: Yes, you can defer your enrollment to the next available intake with advance notice.

applyPage.submitSuccessOffline: Application saved locally. It will be submitted when the server is available.
applyPage.submitErrorMessage: There was an error submitting your application. Please try again.

hero.subtitle: From training to placement, we're with you every step of your career journey. Join thousands of successful graduates working at top companies worldwide.

careerSupport.title: Comprehensive Career Support
careerSupport.subtitle: From resume building to job placement, we provide end-to-end career services to ensure your success in the tech industry.

resumeBuilding.title: Resume & Portfolio Building
resumeBuilding.description: Expert guidance to create compelling resumes and portfolios that showcase your skills and stand out to employers.

interviewPrep.title: Interview Preparation
interviewPrep.description: Mock interviews, technical assessments, and behavioral question practice to boost your confidence and performance.

networkingEvents.title: Networking Events
networkingEvents.description: Regular meetups, tech talks, and networking sessions with industry professionals and potential employers.

jobPlacement.title: Job Placement Assistance
jobPlacement.description: Direct connections with hiring partners and personalized job matching based on your skills and career goals.

globalOpportunities.title: Global Opportunities
globalOpportunities.description: Access to international job markets and opportunities with our global network of partner companies.

careerAdvancement.title: Career Advancement
careerAdvancement.description: Ongoing support for career growth, promotions, and transitions throughout your professional journey.

careerJourney.title: Your Career Journey
careerJourney.subtitle: Our structured approach ensures you're fully prepared for your dream tech career.

assessment.title: Skills Assessment
assessment.description: Comprehensive evaluation of your current skills and identification of areas for improvement.

skillsDevelopment.title: Skills Development
skillsDevelopment.description: Targeted training programs to bridge skill gaps and enhance your technical expertise.

portfolioReview.title: Portfolio Review
portfolioReview.description: Professional review and optimization of your portfolio to showcase your best work.

interviewTraining.title: Interview Training
interviewTraining.description: Intensive mock interviews and preparation for both technical and behavioral questions.

jobMatching.title: Job Matching
jobMatching.description: Personalized job recommendations based on your skills, preferences, and career goals.

ongoingSupport.title: Ongoing Support
ongoingSupport.description: Continued career guidance and support even after successful job placement.

hiringPartners.title: Our Hiring Partners
hiringPartners.subtitle: We work with leading companies across various industries to provide our graduates with excellent career opportunities.

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.subtitle: Real graduates, real success stories. See how our career services have transformed lives and launched tech careers.

taroYamada.name: Taro Yamada
taroYamada.quote: FIA's career services were incredible. They helped me land my dream job at Google within 3 months of graduation.

hanakoSato.name: Hanako Sato
hanakoSato.quote: The interview preparation and technical coaching I received were exactly what I needed to succeed in my career transition.

michaelChen.name: Michael Chen
michaelChen.quote: From resume building to salary negotiation, FIA supported me throughout my entire job search process.

faq.title: Career Services FAQ
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our career support services and job placement assistance.

whenBegins.question: When do career services begin?
whenBegins.answer: Career services begin from day one of your program. We integrate career preparation throughout your learning journey, not just at the end.

accessDuration.question: How long do I have access to career services?
accessDuration.answer: You have lifetime access to our career services. We continue to support you throughout your career, including job transitions and advancement opportunities.

jobGuarantee.question: Do you guarantee job placement?
jobGuarantee.answer: While we cannot guarantee specific job placements, we have a 93% employment rate and provide extensive support until you find a suitable position.

visaSponsorship.question: Do you help with visa sponsorship for international opportunities?
visaSponsorship.answer: Yes, we work with partner companies that sponsor visas and provide guidance on the visa application process for international positions.

freelancing.question: Do you support freelancing and remote work opportunities?
freelancing.answer: Absolutely! We help you build a freelance portfolio, find remote opportunities, and develop the skills needed for independent work.

hero.title: Get in Touch with
hero.description: Have questions about our programs? Ready to start your tech journey? We're here to help you every step of the way.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: We'll get back to you within 24 hours

privacy.consent: and consent to my information being used to respond to my inquiry.

messages.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

response.question: How quickly will I receive a response?
response.answer: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please call us directly.

campusTour.question: Can I schedule a campus tour?
campusTour.answer: Yes! We offer guided campus tours every weekday. Contact us to schedule your visit and see our state-of-the-art facilities firsthand.

deadlines.question: What are the application deadlines?
deadlines.answer: Application deadlines vary by program and intake period. Generally, we have three intake periods per year. Contact our admissions team for specific dates.

header.title: Our Featured Courses
header.subtitle: Discover our comprehensive range of technology courses designed to equip you with the skills needed to excel in today's digital landscape.

webDev.title: Full-Stack Web Development
webDev.description: Master modern web development with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Build responsive, scalable applications from frontend to backend.

dataScience.title: Data Science & Analytics
dataScience.description: Learn Python, machine learning, and data visualization to extract insights from complex datasets and drive business decisions.

cybersecurity.title: Cybersecurity Specialist
cybersecurity.description: Protect organizations from cyber threats with comprehensive security training covering ethical hacking, network security, and incident response.

cloudComputing.title: Cloud Computing & DevOps
cloudComputing.description: Master cloud platforms like AWS and Azure, learn containerization with Docker, and implement CI/CD pipelines.

aiMl.title: AI & Machine Learning
aiMl.description: Dive deep into artificial intelligence and machine learning with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and advanced neural network architectures.

mobileDev.title: Mobile App Development
mobileDev.description: Create native and cross-platform mobile applications using React Native, Flutter, and native iOS/Android development.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Tech Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of students who have transformed their careers with our industry-leading programs.

applications.subject: Subject
applications.sendCopy: Send me a copy of this email
applications.reApplication: Re: Your Application to Forum Academy
applications.templateReceived:
Dear {{name}},

Thank you for your application to Forum Academy. We have received your application and are currently reviewing it.

We will contact you within 3-5 business days with an update on your application status.

If you have any questions in the meantime, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Forum Academy Admissions Team
applications.templateRequest:
Dear {{name}},

We need additional information to process your application. Please provide:

1. [Required Document/Information]
2. [Required Document/Information]

Please reply to this email with the requested information.

Best regards,
Forum Academy Admissions Team
applications.templateAcceptance:
Dear {{name}},

Congratulations! We are pleased to inform you that your application to Forum Academy has been approved.

Welcome to our learning community!

Next Steps:
1. Complete your enrollment within 7 days
2. Attend the orientation session
3. Access your student portal

We look forward to supporting your educational journey.

Best regards,
Forum Academy Admissions Team

student.welcomeMessageText:
Dear {{name}},

Welcome to Forum Academy! We're excited to have you join our learning community.

Your courses are now available in your student portal. If you need any assistance getting started, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Forum Academy Academic Team
student.progressReminderText:
Dear {{name}},

We noticed you haven't been active in your courses recently. Staying consistent with your studies is key to success.

If you're facing any challenges or need support, please let us know. We're here to help you succeed!

Best regards,
Forum Academy Academic Team
student.supportCheckText:
Dear {{name}},

How are your studies going? We wanted to check in and see if you need any additional support or have questions about your courses.

Feel free to reach out anytime - we're here to support your learning journey.

Best regards,
Forum Academy Academic Team

teacher.welcomeMessageText:
Dear {{name}},

Welcome to the Forum Academy teaching team! We're thrilled to have you contribute to our educational mission.

Your teaching dashboard is ready, and your first classes are scheduled. If you need any assistance or resources, please reach out.

Best regards,
Forum Academy Administration
teacher.performanceUpdateText:
Dear {{name}},

Thank you for your excellent work with our students. Your dedication to quality education is greatly appreciated.

We'd like to discuss your recent teaching performance and explore opportunities for further collaboration.

Best regards,
Forum Academy Administration
teacher.supportOfferText:
Dear {{name}},

We hope you're enjoying your teaching experience at Forum Academy. Is there anything we can do to better support you in your role?

Whether it's resources, training, or administrative support, we're here to help you succeed.

Best regards,
Forum Academy Administration
